messages.message:
Brian
If you were going to buy a gun right now, what are some good brands/models?  Looking for less than $140, http://www.zephyrpaintball.com/product/1-KIT-VICTORBRNZ/Spyder-Victor-Semi-Auto-Bronze-Paintball-Gun-Package.html
Spyder Victor Semi-Auto Bronze Paintball Gun Package
Spyder Victor Semi-Auto Features: All Aluminum Extruded Body Ergonomically Designed High Impact Polymer Trigger Frame Reduced Overall Profile (15% Lighter and 10% Shorter) Pull Pin Top Cocking Delrin Bolt Anodized Matte Finish Standard CA Thread Vertical Adapter Tool-Fr...
zephyrpaintball.com

Nate
If I got a gun right now i would buy a tippmann 98 custom. They barely need to be cleaned or taken care of and last forever. The company itself makes most of the upgrades so they all work smoothly with each other. If I had one now I would want something low maintenance and solid. I'm not exactly sure how much they cost but i think its around 140.
